title: wine_Law_2012_Beyond_Category_Red_(Paso_Robles)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 78835.
country: US.
description: A bombastic blend of 44% Syrah, 19% Grenache, 18% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Mourv√®dre and 9% Petite Sirah, this wine offers blueberry ice cream, chocolate-chip cookies, crushed berries and hot gingerbread on the luxurious nose. The palate packs a similarly vast array of flavors that range from tobacco and dried mint to pine forest and pencil shavings, as well as black currant, black loam and baking spice..
designation: Beyond Category.
points: 93.
price: 69.0.
province: California.
region_1: Paso Robles.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
